articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - British retailers called on the police to help enforce the wearing of masks to limit the spread of COVID-19, with two of the biggest supermarkets saying on Monday they would challe… [+2357 chars]

articles.title: Ministers considering tougher lockdown restrictions on exercise and face masks - The Telegraph
articles.description: Boris Johnson held meeting with Cabinet colleagues to discuss whether current rules working to reduce Covid cases at sufficient rate
articles.content: It came as 563 further deaths and 54,940 new Covid cases were recorded on Sunday. New modelling suggests that one in five people in England have now had the disease, demonstrating its rampant spread.… [+1658 chars]
